name: TheJazzGroove
0:
”Alexa, open The Jazz Groove”
”Alexa, play The Jazz Groove”
”Alexa, ask The Jazz Groove what's playing”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the jazz groove
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Jazz Groove is a listener-supported, ad-free online radio station at JazzGroove.org. We play jazz that’s laid-back. Cool. Elegant.

To start, just say "Alexa, enable The Jazz Groove.". Once it's enabled, anytime you'd like to listen just say, "Alexa, open The Jazz Groove".

Want to know what's playing? Say "Alexa, ask The Jazz Groove what's playing."
